Machines.Description: Machines help your colonists out a bit! They need to be researched to be activated and Machinists to maintain them.
Machines.Title: Machines
Machines.FuelDescription: The machinests will use the fuel in the order shown up to the max fuel % (100% by default 150% fully researched).
Machines.MachineRepairsDescription: The less damaged a machine the cheaper it is to fix
